name: Gardner
message: I never would've guessed there was a passage this long underneath the mansion.　　　　　　　　At this rate, it wouldn't be surprising if underground tunnels ran beneath all of Arkham.

name: Jonathan
message: If you use Philip's surplus wealth, something like this probably wasn't all that difficult.

name: Gardner
message: But to do something on this scale, you'd have needed a considerable number of people.

name: Gardner
message: I'm amazed no one found out about this until now.

name: Jonathan
message: The craftsmen who dug this tunnel probably never made it back alive.

name: Gardner
message: I wouldn't put it past them to do something like that.

name: Jonathan
message: After all, he's the kind of guy who'd use innocent nuns as test subjects to make Deep One-human hybrids.

name: Gardner
message: Maybe　establishing　Miskatonic　University　was　for　the　same　purpose.

name: Gardner
message: It's no wonder researchers driven mad like Herbert West were born from it.

name: Jonathan
message: There's light up ahead at the end of the tunnel.

name: Gardner
message: Looks like we've arrived at our destination.

name: Jonathan
message: That's so many of them...

name: Jonathan
message: It's shocking enough there's such a vast space under the village, but more than that-how are there so many Deep Ones?

name: Gardner
message: You couldn't get that many even if you gathered all the villagers together.
Where the hell did they all come from...

name: Jonathan
message: Most likely, some of the villagers who vanished in the past are mixed in there.

name: Gardner
message: Is that the gravedigger who said people from this village don't die?
Even so, that's a crazy number.

name: Jonathan
message: That's not all, is it? There must have already been quite a few Deep Ones even before Philip started his experiments.

name: Gardner
message: What's that ring of light thing...

name: Jonathan
message: The Deep Ones keep jumping in.

name: Gardner
message: Beyond that ring of light is where that monster, Cthulhu or whatever, is, huh.

name: Jonathan
message: Most likely, Thomas is the one who opened it.
The ritual has already started.

name: Gardner
message: Since they're being called 'things to be consumed,' that must mean beyond there is Cthulhu's stomach...

name: Jonathan
message: If I'd chosen wrong back there, I might've ended up like that too.

name: Gardner
message: No way, man, I don't care if it's a god or whatever, I'm totally not letting myself get eaten by something like that.

name: Jonathan
message: Gotta stop Thomas, and fast.

name: Jonathan
message: Before Cthulhu wakes up.

name: Gardner
message: Jonathan, over there...

name: Jonathan
message: It's Thomas and Cordelia.

name: Gardner
message: That idiot... totally driven by greed.

name: Jonathan
message: Looks like Cordelia is still okay.
Cordelia seems to be chained to the wall, completely naked.
It's hard to tell from here, but it looks like she's unconscious.

name: Gardner
message: Let's go check it out.
If we don't help her fast, things will get real bad.

name: Jonathan
message: I'll go from the right side, professor, you go from the other‥‥‥‥

name: Jonathan
message: I'll distract him, so please circle around behind Thomas without getting noticed.

name: Gardner
message: Got it. You be careful too.
That　man's　not　sane.　Who　knows　what　he'll　do.

name: Thomas
message: That's it, you freaks.
Hurry up and get swallowed by your boss's gut already！

name: Thomas
message: It'll wake up any minute now.
The monster that's gonna make me the ruler of this world‥‥‥‥

name: Thomas
message: I'm not some do-gooder who's gonna share this power with anybody else.

name: Thomas
message: Heh, Secret society, my ass.
We're not boy scouts, I don't have time for that shit.
Thomas spits this out, then hugs the Necronomicon at his side even tighter.

name: Thomas
message: Hang tight, little lady.

name: Thomas
message: I'll put you out of your misery soon.

name: Jonathan
message: Like hell you will！

name: Thomas
message: Took you long enough, didn't it?
I thought you'd find this place a little quicker.

name: Jonathan
message: We had some problems we needed to take care of first.
Nai　is　dead,　and　your　plan　is　finished　too.

name: Thomas
message: That bastard's dead？
That's just great, ain't got nothin' to do with me.

name: Jonathan
message: Can you control Cthulhu all by yourself？
That's impossible, isn't it.

name: Thomas
message: If it comes to that, I'll just die too, right？
I ain't scared at all.

name: Jonathan
message: What a selfish bastard.
I won't let you do that.

name: Thomas
message: It's too late now, that thing's already starting to wake up.
All that's left is to feed your precious little girl to it.

name: Jonathan
message: You think I'll just stand by and let that happen？

name: Thomas
message: Some rich kid like you tryin' to act tough ain't scary at all.           Besides, you're the same as those monsters over there, aren't you?

name: Thomas
message: Who knows when you'll end up like that too...

name: Jonathan
message: Shut up！

name: Thomas
message: Just stand there and watch.

name: Thomas
message: Watch what I'm gonna do！

name: Gardner
message: Stop it, Thomas！

name: Thomas
message: Wh-what the hell are you doing！

name: Jonathan
message: The Necronomicon...

name: Thomas
message: Get away... the book... my book...

name: Thomas
message: You bastard...

name: Thomas
message: I'll fucking kill you！

name: Gardner
message: Run... Jonathan！

name: Thomas
message: Let go！
No one's getting away... You're all gonna die here！

name: Gardner
message: H-hurry... Cordelia...

name: Thomas
message: Die, you bastard... Die！

name: Jonathan
message: Cordelia... Wake up！
Cordelia, cradled in my arms, doesn't react at all to my words, lying completely still as if she's dead.

name: Jonathan
message: Cordelia... Ah, please...

name: Jonathan
message: Open your eyes...

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan...

name: Cordelia
message: Where... is this place？

name: Cordelia
message: What... am I doing？

name: Jonathan
message: There's no time to explain. Can you stand？

name: Cordelia
message: Hold on...

name: Cordelia
message: I... I don't think I can.
My　body　won't　do　what　I　tell　it　to.

name: Jonathan
message: It's okay, the wound's not that bad.

name: Cordelia
message: Wound? What are you talking about?

name: Jonathan
message: I'll carry you. Bear with it for just a bit, okay？

name: Cordelia
message: Okay.

name: Thomas
message: L-let go！

name: Thomas
message: Uaaaahhh...

name: Jonathan
message: Professor！

name: Cordelia
message: What's wrong？

name: Cordelia
message: What happened‥‥‥‥‥？

name: Jonathan
message: It's fine‥‥‥‥ You don't have to worry about anything.

name: Jonathan
message: Come on, let's go.

name: Cordelia
message: It's cold‥‥‥‥ Where are we going？

name: Jonathan
message: Just hang in there a little longer.

name: Jonathan
message: You'll feel better soon.

name: Cordelia
message: I'm okay though‥‥‥‥‥

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan, am I heavy？
If I'd known this would happen, I would've lost more weight.

name: Jonathan
message: What are you saying, that's ridiculous.

name: Jonathan
message: Don't worry about stuff like that.
You've already suffered enough, from now on‥‥‥‥‥

name: Cordelia
message: We can go to London together, right？

name: Jonathan
message: Yeah, that's right.

name: Cordelia
message: I wonder if I can see all sorts of things.

name: Jonathan
message: Let's go to all kinds of places together.

name: Cordelia
message: I'm really looking forward to it‥‥‥‥‥‥

name: Jonathan
message: Yeah, it's gonna be fun for sure.

name: Nai
message: I won't let‥‥‥‥ I won't let that happen‥‥‥‥

name: Jonathan
message: Nai‥‥‥ you're still alive?

name: Nai
message: You're the last descendant of the important 'Contractor'‥‥‥‥

name: Nai
message: To awaken my lord‥‥‥‥

name: Nai
message: I won't let you escape‥‥‥‥

name: Jonathan
message: There's no way I'll ever do what you say.
I have no reason to fear anything now！

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan......

name: Jonathan
message: You don't have to say anything, it's all over now.

name: Cordelia
message: Is he dead......？

name: Jonathan
message: Yeah, this time he won't ever wake up again.

name: Cordelia
message: Thank goodness...... now it's really......

name: Jonathan
message: Come on, let's go.

name: Jonathan
message: We're getting out of this village.
After leaving Dunwitch Mansion, I hurried to the harbor where Marsh's corpse was still left abandoned.
I found a relatively decent-looking boat and helped Cordelia aboard.
There was no one left to chase after us anymore.

name: Jonathan
message: Here we go！
Cordelia and I rowed the boat out into the waters off Arkham.
There's no one left who could lay a hand on us now.
If we just let ourselves drift with the current, we'll probably wash up on some shore in a few days.
And then.........
We'll never go near Arkham again.
Cordelia and I will settle somewhere we don't have to hide from the world and live out our days in seclusion.
Everything that happened here will be locked away in the depths of our memory, and eventually sink and disappear into the gentle mist of forgetfulness.
Did it really end with this？
Nai is dead, and all of Arkham's inhabitants have vanished.
There’s no one left who remembers Arkham as it once was.
But……

name: Voice
message: Yes, the blood of the Deep One within you will remain forever.
You’ll never be able to escape from that curse.

name: Voice
message: The day will surely come when my lord will rule over this world once again.
A day will surely come when chaos and terror engulf the world.

name: Voice
message: You can never escape it……
The evil voice inside me echoed again and again, then faded away.
Will that day really come？
But………
Cordelia is by my side.
She’s left everything to me, sleeping peacefully with a gentle breath……
I also lay down beside her.
I didn’t dream anymore.
